overview.p: The OM-SE050ARD-E is the flexible and easy-to-use development kit for the EdgeLock SE050 secure element Plug and Trust product family.

ul.li: OM-SE050ARD-E is configured with the EdgeLock SE050E (Common Criteria certified EAL 6+ with extended range of ECC and symmetric cryptographic options)

overview.p: For more information on the EdgeLock SE050 configurations please download the respective Application Note AN12436.

The development kits can be used in various ways, for example, via the Arduino interface compatible to any board featuring an Arduino compatible header, including many i.MX, LPC and Kinetis® boards, or via a direct I2C connection. The kits allow evaluation of the SE050 product family features and simplify the development of secure IoT applications.
More information can be found in the respective Application Note AN13539.
Additional examples can be found in the standalone EdgeLock SE05x Plug and Trust Middleware SDK package available in the Software section.
